short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HotelGyms.com provides the only travel advisory to help you find hotels with great fitness and well-being in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beautiful Sunshine. Glorious Hotel.
…Awful Gym?

We feel your pain.

But traveling no longer means sacrificing your fitness routine! Welcome to the HotelGyms.com Browser Extension, a game-changer for those who prioritize fitness while on the move.

Our technology leverages a mix of AI and human input to apply a GymFactor rating to every hotel, because we believe that your fitness efforts shouldn’t take a back seat whilst you’re on your travels.

**It is a FREE tool and a MUST-HAVE for every traveler!**

As a pioneer in merging travel with fitness, HotelGyms is excited to bring its unique expertise straight to your preferred booking sites. Our technology leverages a mix of AI and human input to apply a GymFactor rating to every hotel, because we believe that your fitness efforts shouldn’t take a back seat whilst you’re on your travels.

Why Choose Our Browser Extension?
> Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly with Booking.com, Expedia, HotelPlanner, Kayak, and Momondo, providing the GymFactor Score for hotels on these platforms.

> GymFactor Score: This score gives you an instant insight into the quality of hotel fitness facilities, making it easier to choose accommodations that align with your fitness goals.

> Easy Activation: Simply install the extension and activate it with your email address. It's that straightforward!


Supporting HotelGyms.com:
By using our extension, you're doing more than just prioritizing your fitness. You're also supporting HotelGyms.com. As affiliates of Kayak and Booking.com, we earn a small commission for bookings made via our extension. Importantly, this doesn't change the price you pay. Instead, it's a way to help us keep improving our free service for fitness-minded travelers like you.
